resources.string: Please rotate the wheel to catch the token from the input tube.
Please rotate the wheels to fall the token from the top wheel to the bottom wheel.
Please rotate the bottom wheel to fall the token to the output tube.
Please fall the tokens to the output tube in order. first token 2 and then taken 3.
Notice the order. Token 2 should be before token 3.
Please fall the tokens to the output tube in order. first token 4 and then taken 5.
Notice the order. Token 4 should be before token 5.
